attributes.action: Give Financial support for the Aviation industry.
attributes.background: The aviation industry is already on its knees having had a 3 month long lockdown. If the government doesn’t give appropriate financial aid, another month, or more, of lockdown will completely crush the industry resulting in jobs being lost and airlines going out of business.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extend furlough scheme for the UK Aviation sector to help stop redundancies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331434

Provide specific support for the UK Aviation industry
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553818
